<title>Phoenix Full Day</title>
<meta name="description" content="Experience the excitement of a full day of advanced whitewater as we splash through Clear Creek; don't worry, we will take a short break for lunch so you can re-fuel!" />

yoast_head_json.description: Experience the excitement of a full day of advanced whitewater as we splash through Clear Creek; don't worry, we will take a short break for lunch so you can re-fuel!
